alert.note: Alert for Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 8:41PM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour expected at times. Blowing and drifting snow also expected on Saturday with limited visibilities across open areas. * WHERE...Cass MI County. Heaviest additional lake effect snow accumulations across western portions of the county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate to heavy bands of lake effect snow showers through the remainder of the evening, with the heaviest snow accumulations across southwest Cass County. A lull in the lake effect snow is expected overnight into early Saturday, but additional moderate to heavy lake effect snow showers are expected on Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
